author: henning
msg: - Make all Security object classes (not just User objects) configureable.
- Deprecate a few methods (which moved from the implementation class
in DBSecurityManager to the abstract Base class so they're available
in all the Security Service implementations) and replace them with
- Add some docs to the security service of how to do the object exchange.

author: henning
msg: - Next round of style and doc fixes from our internal CVS
prevent the accidential creation of empty objects
- change the method to save an user in store() and createAccount

author: henning
msg: Convert the existing Security Service to use the Crypto Service to
encrypt and check passwords for the users.
The LDAP Service does not provide any password changing or checking
code inside turbine (it uses the LDAP server to check) so this doesn't
change any code inside the LDAP security Service.

author: henning
msg: Added the crypto-service docs from Fulcrum. As we need the crypto service
for the Security Service, we better document it, too.
